summary: SevenWardrobe -  female clothes and armor for SeveNBase Bombshell.
descriptionHtml:
SevenWardrobe - SeveNBase Bombshell

SevenWardrobe 1.2 female clothes and armor for SeveNBase Bombshell


[img]https://41.media.tumblr.com/e415a06eea1218110788089f8fc7b2c4/tumblr_n5s343XDRj1s7mtq8o1_1280.png[/img]
[img]https://24.media.tumblr.com/47cc2733edf58c339a8853c17f25a219/tumblr_n5sdg1bI5q1s7mtq8o1_1280.png[/img]
[img]https://24.media.tumblr.com/92cda184a8dd17efa6bb3437fe77fbb0/tumblr_n5schisvz11s7mtq8o1_1280.png[/img]

Mod includes:

clothes and armor

armor:
Bombshell Dragon Armor

clothes:
GothiChix Long Dress
GothiChix Outfit
GothiChix Gloves
GothiChix Helmet
GothiChix BE - Update BarbarianExplorer + BBP + Weight slider

Readme file

Requirements:
1. You have to install a skeleton which supports BBP such as XP32’s or Skulltyrant’s.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/]2. SeveNBase Bombshell Female Body Replacer.[/url]

Update:
1.3 - fix gloves

Credits:
Dimon99 & Calyps For the UNP Body meshes.
Apachii For the Hair.
mysticentity for banner
